Reviews.Title: “Walk to EVERYTHING, perfect and great value!”
Reviews.Author: Sara S
Reviews.Content: friendly couple didnt speak language managed accomplish helpful maps city ride airport clean pleasant perfect bathroom walk museums plazas cathedrals id stay minute loved madrid partly convenient comfortable little own tiny apartment city

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous location, terrific management and clean!”
Reviews.Author: Abby L
Reviews.Content: stayed single pension days beginning april 2012 location walking distance museums plaza mayor time cultural centers cab metro hostel management speak english patient accommodating fine extremely broken spanish expected single bathroom facilities fine clean day bed clean bathroom etc street noise except futbol games thats half fun definitely recommend youre budget looking nice clean facility stay madrid

Reviews.Title: “it has everything you need”
Reviews.Author: patkosvero
Reviews.Content: cheap hostel little wellequipped arrangement modern special shower comfortable clean city center noisy central location madrid means noisy location fortunately silent slept personnel helpful friendly id definitely return advice

Reviews.Title: “Great deal! Wonderful location, great staff, quiet & clean!”
Reviews.Author: cmwaddell
Reviews.Content: boyfriend loved stay hostal located close las huertas plaza de santa ana incredible dinner spots near metro anton martin close puerta del sol center madrid 3rd floor building nice little elevator im owner spoke english realized werent fluent spanish spoke slowly simply helpful nice cute decorations wonderful double nice sized bathroom shower balcony facing courtyard closet hairdryer free wifi nights spent madrid stayed little closer sol loud hostal window facing courtyard nice quiet late night paid 45 euros 1 night definitely wonderful deal plus check isnt noon usually nice

Reviews.Title: “GOOD VALUE, CLEAN , GOOD LOCATION,”
Reviews.Author: charlieseven
Reviews.Content: spent 10 days hostal owner helpful informative little clean shower location walking distance historical madrid lots eat price dont cant beat
